col-sm-7"><h1>What is Trakt?</h1><p>Trakt is a platform that does many things, but primarily keeps track of TV shows and movies you watch. It integrates with your media center or home theater PC to enable scrobbling, so everything is automatic. Some people like to check in from their phone, so we enable that too. </p><p>We also make it easy to find <em>where</em> to watch movies and TV shows on hundreds of streaming sources such as Netflix, Amazon, Hulu, and iTunes. Check out our <a href="/vip#standard-features">complete feature list.</a></p><p>Trakt is free to use and powers thousands of apps, most free to use! If you enjoy Trakt, please consider <a href="/vip">upgrading your account to VIP</a> to help pay for servers and unlock some awesome VIP features like no ads, year in review, iCal feeds, advanced filtering, list cloning, and widgets. Stop reading and <a href="/auth/join">sign up now!</a></p><div class="btn-group"><a class="btn btn-primary" href="/auth/join">Join Trakt</a><a class="btn btn-signin" href="/auth/signin">Sign Your VIP membership pays for servers, hides ads, and unlocks some awesome VIP only features!</h2><button class="btn btn-primary">Learn About VIP</button></div></div></div></div></div></section></a><section id="faq-wrapper"><div class="container"><h1>Frequently Asked Questions</h1><h2>Have a question? So did a lot of other people.</h2><div class="row"><div class="col-md-12"><div class="faq-item" id="faq-watch"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-watch .answer" data-toggle="collapse">How do I watch a TV show or movie?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>We don’t stream any TV shows or movies to watch on Trakt. However, we make it easy to find <em>where</em> to watch TV & movies on hundreds of streaming services like Netflix, Amazon, Hulu, and iTunes in 38 countries. Just click a <b>Watch Now</b> button or icon, choose your favorite service, and start watching. <a href="/b/watchnow" target="_blank">More info <i class="fa fa-long-arrow-right"></i></a></p><p>Most media centers will also have streaming plugins that will scrobble what you’re watching to Trakt. However, these are configured in your media center, and not on Trakt. Please reach out to the plugin developers directly if you have any questions about them.</p></div></div><div class="faq-item" id="faq-pin"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-pin .answer" data-toggle="collapse">How do I connect my media center?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>Media center plugins use what we call device authentication. This is used to link your Trakt account without needing to directly enter your username or password. This also allows you to sign in using your social account. Here are the general steps to connect your media center.</p><br><ol><li><a href="/join">Create a new Trakt account</a> if you don't have one.</li><li>Open the plugin settings and look for the authentication section. Instructions and an 8 digit code should be displayed.</li><li>Visit <a href="/about?target=_blank">https://trakt.tv/activate</a> on your computer, phone, or tablet.</li><li>Enter the 8 digit code displayed on your device. (If you're not signed in, it will ask you to do that first)</li><li>Allow access to the media center plugin you're installing.</li><li>Return to your media center and your Trakt account is now connected!</li></ol><p><strong>No code displayed on your device?</strong><br>Please make sure you've installed the latest version of your media center plugin. They might be using an old authentication method that isn't supported anymore. In that case, please reach out directly to the plugin developer to get more specific info.</p><p><strong>Connecting more devices?</strong><br>You can connect as many devices as you'd like. Each device requires a unique code. Please follow the above steps for each media center you want to connect.</p><p><strong>Specific Configuration Guides</strong><br><a target="_blank" href="/b/kodi">Kodi</a></p></div></div><div class="faq-item" id="faq-add-show"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-add-show .answer" data-toggle="collapse">How do I add a missing TV show?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>We use a combination of <a href="http://themoviedb.org" target="_blank">TMDB</a> and <a href="http://thetvdb.com" target="_blank">TVDB</a> for TV show information. TMDB is used for the top level show info like title, year, genres, and country. It is also used for high quality posters, fanart, and episode screenshots. TVDB is used for all season and episode info and as a fall back for info missing on TMDB.</p><br><ol><li>Make sure the TV show exists on <a href="http://themoviedb.org" target="_blank">TMDB</a> and <a href="http://thetvdb.com" target="_blank">TVDB</a> with English information filled out.</li><li>On TMDB, make sure the correct TVDB ID is entered in the external IDs section.</li><li>On the Trakt website, click the <b>Import TV Show</b> link in the footer.</li><li>Type in the TVDB ID and click the <b>Import</b> button.</li></ol></div></div><div class="faq-item" id="faq-add-movie"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-add-movie .answer" data-toggle="collapse">How do I add a missing movie?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>We use <a href="http://themoviedb.org" target="_blank">TMDB</a> for all movie information. It's free for anyone to sign up and edit info at TMDB.</p><br><ol><li>Make sure the movie exists on <a href="http://themoviedb.org" target="_blank">TMDB</a> with <b>English</b> information filled out.</li><li>On the Trakt website, click the <b>Import Movie</b> link in the footer.</li><li>Type in the TMDB ID and click the <b>Import</b> button.</li></ol></div></div><div class="faq-item" id="faq-watchlist"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-watchlist .answer" data-toggle="collapse">Why do things get removed from my watchlist after watching them?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>This is by design. The watchlist is a special <b>"I want to watch"</b> list for you to remember to watch something. Once you watch it, it automatically gets removed. In the case of shows, once you watch 1 episode, the site knows about it and the show will continue showing up on your personal calendar and progress views. So, there is no need to keep it on the watchlist. If you need to keep something around, you can always make a custom list.</p></div></div><div class="faq-item" id="faq-comments"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-comments .answer" data-toggle="collapse">What are the rules for posting comments?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>Comments can be posted as a quick shout or a more detailed review. All comments must be at least 5 words and anything over 200 words is automatically marked as a review. <b>We reserve the right to remove any content that breaks these rules. Repeated violators will be banned from commenting.</b></p><br><div class="ul-title good"><i class="fa fa-check-circle"></i>Things you should do...</div><ul><li>Be respectful, we all love different TV shows and movies!</li><li>It's ok to have different opinions and offer constructive criticism, but don't be mean or harrassing</li><li>All comments and replies must be at least 5 words</li><li>Only write comments in English</li><li>Mark spoilers that reveal important plot elements</li><li>Use markdown for formatting — <em><a href="https://www.markdownguide.org/cheat-sheet/" target="_blank">cheat sheet</a></em></li><li class="emojis-supported">Use emoji :smiley:</li></ul><div class="ul-title bad"><i class="fa fa-times-circle"></i>Things you should not do...</div><ul><li>Trolling, abuse, threats, and harassment will not be tolerated</li><li>Do not promote hate, violence or intolerance based on race, age, gender, gender identity, ethnicity, religion or sexual orientation</li><li>Do not ask where to watch something or share links to copyrighted content — <em><a href="/b/watchnow" target="_blank">more info</a></em></li><li>Do not post spam or advertisments</li><li>Do not ask support related questions — <em>use our <a href="https://support.trakt.tv" target="_blank">support forums</a> for that</em></li><li>Check to make sure you haven't posted duplicate comments</li></ul></div></div><div class="faq-item" id="faq-spoiler"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-spoiler .answer" data-toggle="collapse">What is a spoiler?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>A spoiler is a remark or piece of information which reveals important plot elements for a movie or TV show. When posting comments, it is a requirement to correctly mark if your shout or review contains spoilers so we don't <em><b>spoil</b></em> the item for a member who hasn't watched it yet. Some examples of a spoiler include discussing the ending of a movie or talking about a character who dies in a TV show. Correctly indicating spoilers is good for the Trakt community.</p><p>Spoilers can be indicated in 2 ways — by enabling the <b>Spoiler Alert?</b> button when posting your comment, or by wrapping your spoiler text with special tags like <b>[spoiler]this is a spoiler[/spoiler]</b> in the body of your comment.</p><p>We also have some handy settings to help you avoid spoilers when browsing the website. <a href="/b/no-spoilers" target="_blank">More info <i class="fa fa-long-arrow-right"></i></a></p></div></div><div class="faq-item" id="faq-hide-show"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-hide-show .answer" data-toggle="collapse">How do I hide TV shows I don't watch anymore?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>You can hide TV shows in a few ways. On your <a href="/calendars">calendar</a>, click the <b>Ø</b> icon under any episode to hide the entire show from all your calendars. On your <a href="/dashboard">dashboard up next</a> and <a href="/users/me/progress">progress page</a>, click the <b>Ø</b> icon near the TV show title to hide the show in both places.</p><p>If you need to unhide a show, you can do that <a href="/settings/">in your settings</a>.</p></div></div><div class="faq-item" id="faq-progress"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-progress .answer" data-toggle="collapse">Why does a TV show's progress say 0 out of 0 episodes?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>In order to correctly determine your watched or collected progress, all episodes need air dates. We use this date to know if the episode has actually aired or not. For currently airing shows, this ensures future episodes aren't counted. For shows that have ended, this helps so that unaired (for cancelled shows) or DVD only episodes aren't counted. You can add air dates on <a href="http://thetvdb.com" target="_blank">TVDB</a> and Trakt will automatically sync up that night. Your progress will start calculating correctly after Trakt has the air dates.</p></div></div><div class="faq-item" id="faq-friends"><h3 aria-expanded="false" data-target="#faq-friends .answer" data-toggle="collapse">How do I add friends?</h3><div class="answer collapse"><p>Trakt allows you to <b>follow</b> other members of the community. If they follow you back, you are considered <b>friends</b>. To follow a user, navigate to their user profile page and click the Follow button. If the user has a public profile, you will be immediately following them. If they are private, they will need to approve your follow request.</p></div></div></div></div></div></section><section id="press-wrapper"><h1>Press Coverage</h1><h2>A deeper look into Trakt and the Trakt API is free to use, but we do have a few requirements.</h2></div></div></div></section><section class="statics-block" id="logo-downloads-wrapper"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-xs-12"><h1 class="balance-text">Logos</h1><h2 class="balance-text">Use these Trakt logos to clearly identify your app is powered by Trakt <em>(but don't name your app Trakt)</em>. Please don't alter the logos or colors. Each logo pack includes vector & pixel images. If you have questions or want us to review your app, <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#7d0e080d0d120f093d090f1c160953090b420e081f17181e09403f0f1c131914131a584f4d2f180c08140f18101813090e">please email us</a>.</h2></div></div><div class="row logos-wrapper"><div class="col-sm-4" data-toggle="tooltip" title="ZIP File - 3MB"><a href="https://walter.trakt.tv/logos/trakt-logos-wide.zip"><div class="logo"><div class="download"><div class="icon"><div class="fa fa-arrow-circle-down"></div></div></div><img src="/assets/branding/logos/wide/pixels/trakt-wide-red-black-9bcf1f10ae5d84e9ac5534cfc425ffcb.png" alt="Trakt wide red black" /></div></a></div><div class="col-sm-4" data-toggle="tooltip" title="ZIP File - 3MB"><a href="https://walter.trakt.tv/logos/trakt-logos-icon.zip"><div class="logo"><div class="download"><div class="icon"><div class="fa fa-arrow-circle-down"></div></div></div><img src="/assets/branding/logos/icon/pixels/trakt-icon-red-e8c6f752ea8ba91b69cb667f6f9f3153.png" alt="Trakt icon red" /></div></a></div><div class="col-sm-4" data-toggle="tooltip" title="ZIP File - 3MB"><a href="https://walter.trakt.tv/logos/trakt-logos-tall.zip"><div class="logo"><div class="download"><div class="icon"><div class="fa fa-arrow-circle-down"></div></div></div><img src="/assets/branding/logos/tall/pixels/trakt-tall-red-black-aca8b5940b218f9df5bcf715557c5a72.png" alt="Trakt tall red black" /></div></a></div></div></div></section><section class="hero-wrapper" id="apps-wrapper"><div class="full-screenshot lazy" data-original="/assets/branding/hero/auth@2x-53e02917b95ceb49c007e3baf29326e4.jpg"></div><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-6 col-sm-offset-6 info-wrapper"><div><h1>Trakt Authentication</h1><h2>Integration with Trakt is a core feature that many users look for when choosing their media apps. Trakt is the glue between different devices and allows the user to quickly onboard with your app. We can also serve as a cloud backup for your user's data.</h2><h2>Mobile apps use OAuth and the integrated web browser to connect with Trakt. Media centers <em>(and other apps without an integrated web browser)</em> display an activation code and instruct the user to visit the Trakt website to complete the process.</h2><div class="buttons"><a class="btn btn-primary" target="_blank" href="https://trakt.docs.apiary.io/#reference/authentication-oauth">Mobile Apps</a><a class="btn btn-primary" target="_blank" href="https://trakt.docs.apiary.io/#reference/authentication-devices">Media Centers</a></div></div></div></div></div></section><section class="hero-wrapper light" id="scrobblers-wrapper"><div class="full-screenshot lazy" data-original="/assets/branding/hero/media-center@2x-ef7c62d7bea10ed36e388c4a8173f18e.jpg"></div><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-7 col-lg-6 info-wrapper"><div><h1>Scrobbling & Checkins</h1><h2>Media centers should automatically track and scrobble what the user is actively watching. The scrobbling methods attach to the play, pause, and stop actions when watching media and is seemless to the user.</h2><h2>Mobile apps should allow the user to manually check in and indicate what they're watching right now. Once the runtime has elapsed, Trakt automatically adds it to the user's watched history.</h2><div class="buttons"><a class="btn btn-primary" target="_blank" href="https://trakt.docs.apiary.io/#reference/scrobble">Scrobble API</a><a class="btn btn-primary" target="_blank" href="https://trakt.docs.apiary.io/#reference/checkin">Checkin API</a></div></div></div></div></div></section><section class="hero-wrapper light" id="api-wrapper"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-lg-10 col-lg-offset-1 info-wrapper"><h1 class="balance-text">Questions?</h1><h2 class="balance-text"><a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#5c2f292c2c332e281c282e3d372872282a632f293e36393f28611e2e3d323835323b796e6c0e392d29352e39313932282f">Please email us</a> with any questions about our branding requirements or if you'd like us to review your app. Check out the API docs and developer forum to see how Trakt can help you out.</h2><div class="buttons"><a class="btn btn-primary" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#c4b7b1b4b4abb6b084b0b6a5afb0eab0b2fbb7b1a6aea1a7b0f986b6a5aaa0adaaa3e1f6f496a1b5b1adb6a1a9a1aab0b7">Email Us</a><a target="_blank" class="btn btn-primary" href="https://trakt.docs.apiary.io">API Docs</a><a target="_blank" class="btn btn-primary" href="/b/dev-forum">Developer Forum</a></div></div></div></div></section><input id="moviehuck" type="hidden" value="true"><input id="abhuck" type="hidden" value="true"><script data-cfasync="false" src="/cdn-cgi/scripts/5c5dd728/cloudflare-static/email-decode.min.js"></script><script>hucksterDisplays = [
